Roanoke.Valley View Mall (Roanoke, Virginia):
Valley View Mall is a 800,000-square-foot (74,000 m2) regional shopping mall located in the Roundhill neighborhood of Roanoke, Virginia. It is located near the interchange of Interstate 581/U.S. Route 220 with Hershberger Road (State Route 101) in the northwest section of the city.
Most outparcel locations around Valley View Mall have been developed into restaurants, retail stores, offices, and hotels.
